resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( userID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, pbLink TEXT, banner TEXT, bio TEXT, location TEXT, link TEXT);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tweet ( tweetID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, userID INTEGER, time INTEGER, tweet TEXT, retweet INTEGER, favorite INTEGER, answers INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (userID) REFERENCES user(userID));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS favorit ( ownerID INTEGER, tweetID INTEGER UNIQUE, FOREIGN KEY (ownerID) REFERENCES user(userID), FOREIGN KEY (tweetID) REFERENCES tweet(tweetID));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trend ( trendpos INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, trendname TEXT, trendlink TEXT);
